item.title: The jaina view
item.description: The jainas possess some interesting divergent variants of the canonical Indo-Aryan myths. The harivaMsha of jinasena and the triShaShThisalakapuruSha charita of hemachandra is a rather rich source for such mythic material. The jaina view postulated the existance of 63 salakapuruShas or notable figures who are like spokes in the wheel of time. Not unexpectedly the 63 includes the 24 tirthankaras. Other than these there are 12 chakravartins who start with the great bhArata.
